api_key_placeholder: Enter the api key to access the LLM APIs

create_assistant_field_system_prompt_des: The prompt used to initialize conversations

cant_create_assistant_if_no_backend: Can't create an assistant if no backend is defined
create_assistant_field_temperature_place: A number from 0 to 1, where 0 means fully repeatable and one means 'creative'
legal-disclaimer: Logicle Chat can make mistakes. Consider checking important information.
clear-all-messages: Are you sure you want to clear all messages?
login-error: There was a problem with your login.
email-login-error: Something went wrong while sending the email. Please try again later.
email-login-success: A sign in link has been sent to your email address. The link will expire in 24 hours.
sign-up-message: Signing up signifies that you have read and agree to the Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy.
sso-connection-successfully-updated: SSO connection has been successfully updated
sso-connection-successfully-created: SSO connection has been successfully created
successfully-joined: You have successfully joined the workspace.
remove-workspace-warning: Deleting the workspace will delete all resources and data associated with the workspace forever. This action cannot be undone.
leave-workspace-success: You have left the workspace successfully.
allow-workspace: Allow workspace members to login using an Identity Provider.
members-of-a-workspace: Members of a workspace have access to specific areas, such as a new release or a new application feature.
invite-create-account: To continue, you must either create a new account or login to an existing account.
no-active-workspace: You do not have any active workspace.
provision: Provision and de-provision users with your directory provider.
name: Name
delete-member-warning: Deleting a member will delete all activites related to that member. This action cannot be undone.
identity-provider-setup: Please find the SP metadata for Identity Provider configuration at
setup-saml-auth: Fill out the information below to set up SAML authentication for added security
events-description: You can choose which events are sent to which endpoint. By default, all messages are sent to all endpoints.
assistant-description-field-placeholder: Add a short description of what this Assistant does
create-directory-message: Automatically provision and de-provision users with your directory provider.
directory-sync-message: Directory Sync Provider will ask you for the following information to configure your SCIM app.
copy-paste-metadata: Copy and paste Metadata XML here.
workspace-slug-placeholder: A unique ID used to identify this workspace in URLs.
workspace-slug-description: A unique ID used to identify this workspace in URLs.
saml-connection-established: Single Sign-On connection is enabled for your workspace.
new-api-key-description: API keys allow your app to communicate the API.
new-api-warning: Save this API key somewhere safe. You won't be able to see it again once you close this dialog.
no-api-key-title: You haven't created any API Keys yet
no-api-key-description: API Keys allow your app to communicate with app
revoke-api-key-confirm: Are you sure you want to revoke this API Key? This action can not be undone.
remove-tool-confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this tool? Deleting the tool will delete all resources and data associated with the tool forever.
remove-workspace-confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the workspace? Deleting the workspace will delete all resources and data associated with the workspace forever.
leave-workspace-confirmation: Are you sure you want to leave the workspace? You'll lose access to all resources and data associated with the workspace.
remove-backend-confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the backend? Deleting the backend will delete all resources and data associated with the backend forever.
delete-sso-connection-confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this SSO Connection? This action can not be undone.
sp_saml_config_description: Your Identity Provider (IdP) will ask for the following information while configuring the SAML application. Share this information with your IT administrator.
sp_acs_url: ACS (Assertion Consumer Service) URL / Single Sign-On URL / Destination URL
sp_entity_id: SP Entity ID / Identifier / Audience URI / Audience Restriction

allow-only-work-email: Please use your work email to create an account.
remove-user-confirmation: Are you sure you want to remove this user? This action cannot be undone
remove-chat-confirmation: Are you sure you want to remove this chat? This action cannot be undone
remove-assistant-confirmation: Are you sure you want to remove this assistant? This action cannot be undone
assistant-owner-updated: The assistant owner has been successfully updated
